title: #31 The Cleanup part 1 (Mat Edgar, Tony Hinchcliffe, Ari Shaffir)
itunes:title: The Cleanup Part 1 with Mat Edgar, Tony Hinchcliffe
description: Mat Edgar and Tony Hinchcliffe were hired to help clean my apartment. While it wasn't an American horror story, it was pretty close. I'm a damn hoarder and I had built up quite the trash castle in my place. We had a great time talking about how hellish it was and what I can do to keep out of clutter trouble from here on out. And obviously, we talked a bunch about wrestling and Sanford and Son, too.
